title: bitrefill
author: bitrefill
content: Pt. 1 - Bill MacDonald Starting Bitcoin Meetups in SF, Bitcoin vs. Crypto Meetups, Growth of Events & Size with Bill MacDonald of Bay Area Bitcoinershttps://youtu.be/fAz1UGOW9cwThis is part 1 of our interview with bill MacDonald organizer of Bay Area Bitcoiners, a series of bitcoin meetups throughout the Northern california Bay Area. Bill talks about the early days of starting meetups, the cultural differences between Bitcoin and Crypto meetups, and the incredible growth of Bitcoin conferences and events.-----------------------------------------------Follow Bill on social media:Twitter: https://twitter.com/billymacdoBay Area Bitcoiners Twitter: https://twitter.com/bayareabtcWebsite: https://www.bayareabitcoiners.com/-----------------------------------------------Welcome to the 48th episode of Bitrefill's To The Moon Podcast. To The Moon is Bitrefill's new weekly podcast to discuss Bitcoin, altcoins, adoption, news & current events, and all things crypto. Join host Lawrence Ray, along with Jerry Okai, and Ricardo Martinez, for a light-hearted and humorous weekly discussion about the latest developments in the crypto economy.-----------------------------------------------Bitrefill is the largest crypto store since 2014! ðŸš€ Check out our catalog with over 4000+ gift cards and mobile refills worldwide:https://www.bitrefill.com/buy/worldwide/?hl=enSign up for a Bitrefill account:https://www.bitrefill.com/signupDownload the App for iOS & Android:iOS - https://apps.apple.com/us/app/bitrefill/id1378102623Android - https://play.google.com/store/apps/detailâ€¦pp&hl=en_US&gl=US-----------------------------------------------Follow us on: Twitter: https://twitter.com/bitrefill Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bitrefill/Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bitrefillFollow us on Fountain: https://play.fountain.fm/show/GzxqU1Okt5tER2Qbdvi7Join our Sphinx.Chat Tribe:https://tribes.sphinx.chat/t/bitrefillstothemoonpodcastFollow To The Moon Podcast on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ToTheMoonPod -----------------------------------------------#Bitcoin #Crypto #Cryptocurrency #privacy #education #Invest #Finance #news #finance #liveoncrypto #whatisyourmoon #btc #podcast #altcoins #Privacy #Sovereignty #LighningNetwork #BitcoinEconomy #BitcoinPrivacy #CensorshipResistance #BitcoinMeetups #BayAreaBitcoiners

comments.author: bitrefill
comments.body: Pt. 2 Making Bitcoin Noob-Friendly, Bitcoin Attaining Gold Parity, Growing the Bitcoin Communityhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tV_8dD7ZF5EIn part 2 Bill MacDonald describes the cultural divide between hardcore Bitcoiners and curious new users who need Bitcoin education, he also discusses the possibility of digital gold reaching a similar market cap as physical gold, and the challenges of getting new Bitcoiners to meetups.-----------------------------------------------Follow Bill on social media:Twitter: https://twitter.com/billymacdoBay Area Bitcoiners Twitter: https://twitter.com/bayareabtcWebsite: https://www.bayareabitcoiners.com/-----------------------------------------------Welcome to the 48th episode of Bitrefill's To The Moon Podcast. comments.author: bitrefill
comments.body: Pt. 3 BTC in El Salvador & Bukele's Intentions, Lobbying & Bitcoin, Decentralization in Cryptohttps://youtu.be/V0Z1skUmrhEIn Part 3, Bill MacDonald discusses the rollout of the Bitcoin legal tender law in El Salvador, and the prospect of other nations adopting Bitcoin, as well as adoption leading to the rise of a possible Bitcoin lobby to impact policy decisions, and the decentralization of Bitcoin compared to other projects.-----------------------------------------------Follow Bill on social media:Twitter: https://twitter.com/billymacdoBay Area Bitcoiners Twitter: https://twitter.com/bayareabtcWebsite: https://www.bayareabitcoiners.com/-----------------------------------------------Welcome to the 48th episode of Bitrefill's To The Moon Podcast. To The Moon is Bitrefill's new weekly podcast to discuss Bitcoin, altcoins, adoption, news & current events, and all things crypto.
